Translations.Text: Eben se ni send angxel them; eben dead parol al them; eben ni summoned cxiu mirakl them; ili ne kred unless DI vol gxi. Ja plej de them est ignorant
Ni permes enemies cxiu prophet - human jinn diabl - Al inspir each ali rev vort en ord tromp! Hav your Lord willed ili ne done gxi! Vi disregard them their fabrications
This est let mens de those ne kred en Hereafter auxskult al such fabrications akcept them tiel expose their efektiv convictions
Mi streb DI source legx when Li revealed vi this libr fully detal? Those ricev scripture recognize gxi hav revealed your Lord truthfully. Vi ne haven any dub
Vort your Lord est komplet en truth justice Nothing abrogate His vort. Li est Hearer Omniscient
Vi obe majority popol ter ili divert vi path DI. Ili sekv nur konjekt; ili nur diven
Your Lord est fully aware da those stray His path Li est fully aware da those direkt
Vi mangx el ke upon which di nom prononc vi ver kred en His revelations
Why vi ne mangx el ke upon which di nom menci? Li detal vi ki prohibited vi unless vi forced Ja many popol mislead others their personal opinions knowledge. Your Lord est fully aware da transgressors
Vi evit obvious pek tro fel unu. Those earned pek surely pag por their transgressions
Ne mangx el ke upon which nom DI ne menci gxi est abomen! Diabl inspir their allies argue vi; vi obe them vi est idol worshipers
est dead ni granted him life est proviz him light ke enables him mov among des popol, egal al unu total darkness el which li neniam exit works disbelievers tiel ornam their okul
Ni allow konduk criminals cxiu community plot scheme Ili nur plot scheme their own anim sen perceiving

When powerful proof ven al them ili dir Ni ne kred ni don ki don di messengers! DI kon exactly who est bon qualified liver His message Such criminals sufer debasement DI terrible retribution consequence their evil scheming
Whomever DI vol direkt Li renders his kest largx open al Submission. whomever Li vol send astray Li renders his kest intolerant straitened unu grimp tial. DI TIEL EJ curse upon those RIFUZ kred
This est rekt path your Lord Ni eksplik revelations popol pren heed
